@for (allData of touchspinData; track allData){

{{allData.title}}

@if (allData.id === 0) { Use the .decrement-touchspin and .increment-touchspin class. } @if (allData.id === 1) { Use the .decrement-touchspin and .increment-touchspin class. }

@for (data of allData.data; track data) {
}
}
